Package com.amonson.redis

Class RedisProofOfLifeVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amonson.redis.RedisProofOfLifeVariable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class RedisProofOfLifeVariable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This creates variable on the redis server with a timeout value of twice the period (default 5000 ms). Every period the variable is updated with a timestamp value. If this object is stopped then after at most the period times 2 the variable will expire on the redis server and delete itself.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      RedisProofOfLifeVariable​(redis.clients.jedis.Jedis client, int db, java.lang.String name)
      Construct an object with the Redis client and specified name with the default period of 5000ms.
      RedisProofOfLifeVariable​(redis.clients.jedis.Jedis client, int db, java.lang.String name, int period)
      Construct an object with the Jedis client and specified name and period.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean isRunning()
      Check to see if the thread is running the period updates.
      void run()
      Start the thread that starts the periodic update on the redis server.
      void stop()
      Stops a running proof of life thread doing the period update.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RedisProofOfLifeVariable

        public RedisProofOfLifeVariable​(redis.clients.jedis.Jedis client,
                                int db,
                                java.lang.String name)
        Construct an object with the Redis client and specified name with the default period of 5000ms.
        Parameters:
        client - The Redis client object to use in this object for communications.
        db - The Jedis DB to use fo the specified name.
        name - The name of the variable on the redis server.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When any argument is incorrect.

      • RedisProofOfLifeVariable

        public RedisProofOfLifeVariable​(redis.clients.jedis.Jedis client,
                                int db,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                int period)
        Construct an object with the Jedis client and specified name and period.
        Parameters:
        client - The Redis client object to use in this object for communications.
        name - The name of the variable on the redis server.
        period - The period in milliseconds of the redis server variable update, the redis variable expires in twice this value. Cannot be less than 500 ms.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When any argument is incorrect.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Start the thread that starts the periodic update on the redis server. Will fail silently if the server is already running.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Check to see if the thread is running the period updates.
        Returns:
        true if the thread is running, false otherwise.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops a running proof of life thread doing the period update. Will fail silently if the server is not running.
